## \_update() function

Update a object in an object array

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function _update<T extends {}>(array: Maybe<ImmutableArray<T>>, updatedObj: Partial<Immutable<T>>, idProp: Prop<Immutable<T>>): Immutable<T>[];
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  array | Maybe&lt;ImmutableArray&lt;T&gt;&gt; | An array of objects |
|  updatedObj | Partial&lt;Immutable&lt;T&gt;&gt; | An object containing updated properties |
|  idProp | Prop&lt;Immutable&lt;T&gt;&gt; | A property on the object containing a unique value used to match the objects |

<b>Returns:</b>

Immutable&lt;T&gt;\[\]
